en.apply_describe: You can choose to enroll in one or more courses, and we will arrange your class time and place based on the course you choose.
en.apply_contact: If you need further knowledge of our training courses or have any other questions, please feel free to contact us:
en.apply_email_enter: Please enter the correct email format, for example: @ qq.com
en.apply_phone_enter: Please enter numbers without text and other symbolic content
en.apply_yes: Your application has been submitted and we will contact you as soon as possible.
en.banner_describe: UnitedStack cloud training to help you improve the level of comprehensive theory, cultivate actual combat skills.
en.title: UnitedStack - Training Application

zh.apply_describe: 您可以选择报名一个或多个课程，我们会根据您选择的课程合理安排上课时间和地点。
zh.apply_contact: 如果您对我们的培训课程需要进一步了解或有其他疑问，欢迎您随时联系我们：
zh.apply_email_enter: 请输入正确的邮箱格式，例如：@qq.com
zh.apply_phone_enter: 请输入数字不含文字及其他符号内容
zh.apply_yes: 您的申请已提交，我们会尽快和您联系。
zh.banner_brief: 成就 OpenStack 技术专家
zh.banner_describe: 出众的你，既要技术上顶天又要市场上落地。UnitedStack 有云培训帮助你提高综合理论水平、培养实战技能、掌握开源云全局观。
zh.title: UnitedStack - 培训申请
